cards.back: To understand recursion, you must first understand recursion.

cards.front: Why was the JavaScript developer sad?
cards.back: Because they didn't know how to 'null' their feelings.

cards.front: Explain the concept of a RESTful API.
cards.back: REST (Representational State Transfer) is an architectural style for designing networked applications. A RESTful API adheres to REST principles and uses standard HTTP methods for CRUD operations.
